At this stage, there is no available space on earlier departures. However, we are currently checking with our reliable carriers to explore any available options for the same rate.

We will keep you updated on any developments.

 

 

DISCLAIMER 

Please be advised that the global ocean freight situation continues to remain highly volatile. Many major ports and transshipment hubs are experiencing severe congestion, which is leading to significant and unpredictable delays. As a result, carriers are currently unable to guarantee service commitments or transit times as originally scheduled. The services we offer—including estimated transit times and routing—are based on carrier schedules that are subject to change without prior notice. Delays can vary significantly, ranging from a few days to several months. It is also important to note that most carriers do not issue formal notifications for such delays, nor do they offer compensation under the terms of their contract of carriage. Given these challenges, we strongly advise against using sea freight for time-sensitive shipments at this time.

 

 

Regards
